scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a brutal act of martyrdom. A naked man, bound to a wooden rack, is being tortured. His torso is exposed, and a wound, possibly from a branding iron or a sharp instrument, is visible on his abdomen, with bloodstains. To his left, a man in a pink tunic raises a tool, poised to strike. Behind the victim, a crowned figure in red, possibly a king or judge, gestures with his finger, overseeing the torture. Beside him, another figure in a blue tunic and red hood observes the scene. The background features stylized trees and a patterned tapestry-like wall, suggesting an outdoor setting within a somewhat enclosed or decorated area. This scene is likely an illustration of the martyrdom of Saint Lawrence, known for being roasted alive on a gridiron.
